declarationSection.title: Confirm details and send your return

fields.label: Email address
fields.helpText: We will send an email to this address to confirm we’ve received your return

fields.infoText:
# Declaration 
By submitting this return, you declare that the information that you have provided is true and complete.

Send your return and payment by the due date to avoid financial penalties. 

If you give incomplete or inaccurate information, we may charge a financial penalty or even prosecute you.
This is your last opportunity to print or save a pdf copy of your submitted form as you won’t be able to retrieve it later.

fields.label: Information about paying Bingo Duty
fields.infoText:
Pay your Bingo Duty. Send us a payment by bank transfer using these account details:

 Account name: HMRC GACA 

Account number: 12000911

 Sort code: 08 32 00

 Reference for payment: state your Bingo Duty registration number

 If you’ve set up a direct debit to make a payment, you don’t need to do anything else. Your bank will pay us on the payment date.
[What do you think of this service?](https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/4704021/Feedback-Survey-Bingo-Duty-online-form) (takes 1 minute)
